00027 #include <climits>
00028 #include "TimeValue.h"
00029 
00030 namespace com { namespace xuggle { namespace xuggler {
00031 
00032 static int64_t sConversionTable[7][7] =
00033 {        /*  DY, HR,   MI,    SE,       MS,          US,               NS */
00034   /* DY */ {  1, 24, 1440, 86400, 86400000, 86400000000LL, 86400000000000LL },
00035   /* HR */ {  0,  1,   60,  3600,  3600000,  3600000000LL,  3600000000000LL },
00036   /* MI */ {  0,  0,    1,    60,    60000,    60000000LL,    60000000000LL },
00037   /* SE */ {  0,  0,    0,     1,     1000,     1000000LL,     1000000000LL },
00038   /* MS */ {  0,  0,    0,     0,        1,        1000LL,        1000000LL },
00039   /* US */ {  0,  0,    0,     0,        0,           1LL,           1000LL },
00040   /* NS */ {  0,  0,    0,     0,        0,           0LL,              1LL },
00041 };
00042 
00043 TimeValue::TimeValue()
00044 {
00045   mValue = 0;
00046   mUnit = NANOSECONDS;
00047 }
00048 
00049 TimeValue::~TimeValue()
00050 {
00051 }
00052 
00053 void
00054 TimeValue::set(int64_t value, Unit unit)
00055 {
00056   mValue = value;
00057   mUnit = unit;
00058 }
00059 
00060 TimeValue*
00061 TimeValue::make(int64_t value, Unit unit)
00062 {
00063   TimeValue *retval = make();
00064   if (retval)
00065     retval->set(value, unit);
00066   return retval;
00067 }
00068 
00069 TimeValue*
00070 TimeValue::make(TimeValue * src)
00071 {
00072   if (!src)
00073     return 0;
00074   return make(src->mValue, src->mUnit);
00075 }
00076 
00077 ITimeValue::Unit
00078 TimeValue::getNativeUnit()
00079 {
00080   return mUnit;
00081 }
00082 
00083 int64_t
00084 TimeValue::get(Unit aUnit)
00085 {
00086   if (mUnit == aUnit)
00087     return mValue;
00088 
00089   int64_t retval = 0;
00090   bool multiply = false;
00091   int64_t factor = sConversionTable[aUnit][mUnit];
00092   if (!factor)
00093   {
00094     factor = sConversionTable[mUnit][aUnit];
00095     multiply = true;
00096   }
00097   if (multiply)
00098     retval = mValue * factor;
00099   else
00100     retval = mValue / factor;
00101 
00102   return retval;
00103 }
00104 
00105 int32_t
00106 TimeValue::compareTo(ITimeValue* aThat)
00107 {
00108   int32_t retval = -1;
00109   TimeValue* that = dynamic_cast<TimeValue*>(aThat);
00110   if (that)
00111   {
00112     // convert both to NANOSECONDS
00113     Unit thisUnit = this->getNativeUnit();
00114     Unit thatUnit = that->getNativeUnit();
00115 
00116     // NOTE: Order of the entires in the Enum matters here.
00117     Unit minUnit = thisUnit > thatUnit ? thisUnit : thatUnit;
00118 
00119     int64_t thisValue = this->get(minUnit);
00120     int64_t thatValue = that->get(minUnit);
00121     retval = TimeValue::compare(thisValue, thatValue);
00122   }
00123   return retval;
00124 }
